trait.name: Dragon Fanatic
entries: The dragonclaw has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}. While the dragonclaw can see a dragon or higher-ranking Cult of the Dragon cultist friendly to it, the dragonclaw ignores the effects of being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Fanatic Advantage
entries: Once per turn, if the dragonclaw makes a weapon attack with advantage on the attack roll and hits, it deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The dragonclaw has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the dragonclaw's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragonclaw attacks twice with its scimitar.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.
